about_the_game:
Getting tired of searching for the undiscovered contract givers and the randomly buried Time Crystals? Then go on and get yourself this handy dandy launch pad installment! It comes equipped with a top-of-the-line monitor that reveals when a contract giver and/or Time Crystal is located on a planet as soon as your mercs arrive! Why wasn’t this monitor already installed, you ask? Well you see, I got a good deal on these launch pads from my brother-in-law’s second cousin's neighbor’s kid, alright? You don’t turn down a good deal, you just don’t.

This DLC gives you a preview of whether or not a planet contains Time Crystals or contract givers.
